plot: A young man is wrongly convicted and sentenced to be executed. Reporters covering the execution relate the story, each from his own perspective.
title: The Sun Sets at Dawn
plot_es: A young man is wrongly convicted and sentenced to be executed. Reporters covering the execution relate the story, each from his own perspective.
plot_en: A young man is wrongly convicted and sentenced to be executed. Reporters covering the execution relate the story, each from his own perspective.
